[We used to be a magazine,](/acerca-de/) now we're a platform to discover new literature, explore narrative [playlists](/playlist/) and participate in an active community around Spanish writing.

Today you can access more than **[350 stories and microfictions](/cronologico/)** written by emerging authors from Latin America, selected with editorial criteria.

An important part of our catalog comes from the [Transtextos](/transtextos/) archive, a literary publication project recently migrated to MarcaPÃ¡gina. We publish new stories every week. MarcaPÃ¡gina works as a web application: you can read from your browser or install it as a PWA on your phone to take your reading wherever you want.

We are building the best space to read short literature on the internet. This is just the beginning.
